subject: RE: [junit] A good way to end the day
msgSnippet: Kent recommends having a failing test during a long break in your session, solo or pairing. He just doesn t recommend commiting a failing test to the team

Kent recommends having a failing test during a long break in your session, =
solo or pairing. He just doesn't recommend commiting a failing test to the =
team repository. The reasons are obvious.

>So said Bernd on 4/10/2003 ----=
----------------
>> This is in Kent's TDD book. The fact that you arrived a=
t it 
>> independently lends more credibility to the notion.
>
>I am  using=
 this pattern also (arrived at it before reading Kent's book), 
>and not on=
ly at the end of the day but also if there is a predictable
>long break for=
 whatever reason.
>
>But AFAIR Kent only recomends this for single person p=
rojects
>(which is what I do currently)
>
>Bernd
